entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
